title: How Rollups Really Work
description: It's 2024 and L2s are an active and critical part of the Ethereum scaling roadmap. However, many members of the Ethereum community still hold common misconceptions about how rollups operate. If you've ever wondered if a Sequencer can insert invalid blocks into an L2, if a fault proof causes a reorg of the chain, or how a ZK Rollup differs from an Optimistic Rollup under the hood, this is the talk for you. Let's set the record straight -- this is How Rollups Really Work.
